title: Picturesque Tasmania
creator_credit: G Gamon and Australia. Dept of Commerce. Cinema Branch
brief_description: Produced by the Cinema Branch, Australian Department of Commerce. A driving tour of Tasmania from Hobart along the western, northern, eastern and southern coasts focussing on the natural scenery. A number of towns and their various industries can also be seen such as trout hatcheries, the Mt Lyell mine, hops and apple growing. Source: NFSA Film Australia Collection.
